modName: Daedric and Glass Armor and Weapon Retexture
summary: This mod re-textures the Daedric and Glass armor to make it look different. *Hint* If you look at the guards in Whiterun there will be a surprise. Any questions can be directed to LAGGINGHAWK on steam.
descriptionHtml:
We have renamed the Daedric armor and weapons to "Dragonblood"
And the Glass stuff to "Dragontear" stuff
BTW........ There may be an easter egg on the white run guards.......
author: LAGGINGHAWK-V1P3R555-PartyPoison420
